channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: West Bengal: Police recovered
item.description: West Bengal: Police recovered empty bomb shells from near the spot where BJP leader Priyangu Pandey was attacked in Bhatpara of North 24 Parganas Priyangu Pandey claimed that several people attacked and fired on his car, earlier today, in Bhatpara of North 24 Parganas #BJPLeader #PriyanguPandey #BombShells #BengalBandh #News VC - ANI

item.title: U.P govt's new social media po
item.description: U.P govt's new social media policy - 'Legal action for objectionable posts' - Anti-national posts to invite legal trouble - Sharing govt's schemes to be encouraged TIMES NOW's Walter Adeeb shares more details with Ankit Prasad #UPGovt #SocialMediaPolicy #TimesNow #TimesNowNews

item.title: Telangana CM Revanth Reddy par
item.description: Telangana CM Revanth Reddy participates in 'Bhoomi Pujan' for installation of Telangana Thalli Statue in Secretariate premises in Hyderabad (Source: I &PR, Telangana) #TelanganaCM #RevanthReddy #BhoomiPujan #News #TimesNowNews
